menuItems.name: Three Eggs
menuItems.description: Three eggs, but this time we pick how they are cooked.

menuItems.name: Toast, twice
menuItems.description: Two toasts, slightly burned, but we call it the city crisp.

menuItems.name: Sausage Omelette
menuItems.description: An omelette made entirely of sausage. We don't use the word "patty" here.

menuItems.name: Egg Omelette
menuItems.description: Our "traditional" breakfast omelette, made entirely of duck eggs.

menuItems.name: Fourteen Eggs
menuItems.description: 14 whole eggs, uncooked, served in a bowl.

menuItems.name: Steak'n'Eggs
menuItems.description: Steak with eggs. Cooked to order.

menuItems.name: Steak'n'Sausage
menuItems.description: Mountains of Steak and rivers of Sausage. Only for the hungriest of people.
